Translations.Text: Savgand ʙa osmonu ʙa on ci dar saʙ ojad
Va tu ci doni, ki on ci dar saʙ ojad, cist
Sitoraest duraxsanda
Hec kas nest, ki ʙar u nigahʙone naʙosad
Pas odami ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarisa sudaast
Az oʙe cahanda ofarida sudaast
ki az mijoni pustu sina ʙerun meojad
Xudo ʙa ʙozgardonidani u tavonost
ruze, ki rozho (sirho) oskor mesavand
Uro na quvvatest, va na jovare
Qasam ʙa osmoni ʙozʙoranda
Qasam ʙa zamini rujoni sikofxurda, (ʙaroi gijoh)
ki in kitoʙ haqro az ʙotil cudo kunad
va suxani hazl nest
Onon hilae meandesand
va Man ham hilae meandesam
Pas kofironro muhlat deh andak muhlatason deh
Nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgi xudro ʙa poki jod kun
on ki ofarid va durustandom kard
Va on ki andoza mu'ajjan kard. Sipas roh namud
Va on ki carogohhoro rujonid
sipas xusku sijoh gardonid
Ba zudi ʙaroi tu ʙixonem, maʙod, ki faromus kuni
ƣajri on ci Xudo ʙixohad. Ust, ki oskorovu nihonro medonad
Va turo ʙa dini oson tavfiq dihem
Agar pand, dodanat sud kunad, pand deh
On ki metarsad, pand megirad
Va ʙadʙaxt az on duri megirad
on ki ʙa otasi ʙuzurgi cahannam daraftad
va dar on co na ʙimirad va na zinda ʙosad
Alʙatta pokon nacot joftand
onon, ki nomi Parvardigori xudro ʙar zaʙon ovardand va namoz guzoridand
